snippet: The Philadelphia 76ers have used the amnesty clause on the veteran forward Elton Brand and will get about $18 million in salary cap relief for next season.
abstract: Philadelphia 76ers use amnesty clause on the veteran forward Elton Brand and will get about $18 million in salary cap relief for 2012-13 season.
lead_paragraph: The Philadelphia 76ers have used the amnesty clause on the veteran forward Elton Brand and will get about $18 million in salary cap relief for next season.

headline.seo: 76ers Use Amnesty Clause and Waive Elton Brand
headline.main: 76ers Use Amnesty Clause and Waive Brand
